casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Michael WILSON 164P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2017 David Michael Wilson, for Wilson, David Michael. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of January 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
